description: A starter Grafana dashboard for monitoring Docker Events

options.content:
# DocGraf Example Dashboard

## Filters

Filters can be applied to view different subsets of the data.

* MetricSource - Your metrics Datasource
* LogSrouce - Your logs Datasource
* ContainerName - Filter for events for a given container
* EventType - Filter by a specific EventType
* Event - Filter by a specific Event
* Image - Filter for events for a given image

## Container Events Annotations

A toggle is provided for displaying docker container events as annotations.

title: DocGraf
